news.title: WineHQ Server Crash
news.body:
WineHQ's web server died this week of catastrophic hardware failure. The server was offline for about 8 hours as we built a new machine and restored the files. Everything seems to be in place and functional again. If you notice things still broken and/or missing please contact us at web-admin@winehq.org.
Now back to your regularly scheduled Wine programming.
